head.supplied: Horticultural Society of Victoria, ¶ Office, Hawthorn, July 24th, 1868. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor, by direction of the Committee of the above Society, to append a copy of the Advertisement convenin...

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end; font-style: italic;

div.p: Printed notice found inserted loosely in a copy of Victoria Votes and Proceedings of the Legislative Council, Session 1850, Bills. Horticultural Society of Victoria,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end; font-style: italic;

div.p: I have the honor, by direction of the Committee of the above Society, to append a copy of the Advertisement convening the Annual Meeting of Subscribers on Wednesday next, the 29th inst., and to request the favor of your attendance on that occasion.

"Horticultural Society of Victoria. — The Annual General Meeting of the Subscribers will be held in the Mechanics' Institute, Collins-street, on Wednesday, the 29th July, at Two o'clock p.m., to receive the Report of the Committee and to elect Officers for the ensuing year, in accordance with Rule 9. — John Toon, Hon. Sec." — (Argus, 22nd July, 1868.)

Should you be desirous of obtaining any grafts from the Society's Garden this season, application must be sent in before the 31st inst. They will be ready for distribution on and after the 15th August.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-style: italic;

div.p: I have the honor to be,
